title: House of Pansa
description: The House of Pansa (VI,6,1) is an atrium house in Pompeii that occupies an entire insula. Architectural elements date the structure ca. 140-120 BC in its original phase. The merchant and duumvir Cn. Alleius Nigidius Maius owned the property.
names: Domus of Cn. Alleius Nigidius Maius
Domus of the Olii Primus et Paratus and of T. Olius
Casa dello edile pompejano Cuspio Panza

properties.title: OSM location of so-called "Casa di Pansa"
